activities: We have access to/retain information that was provided to us by 1) Client Employer, 2) by Employee individually in requesting service from the BIG site, 3) an Organization for whom you may perform contractual services or 4) entered by Employee into the BIG Portal. The data accessed/retained is required in order to carry out contracted business services. This information is limited to employee name, work location, work email address and work phone number. Where contractual relationships exist, the data provided is updated electronically to ensure that it is complete, consistent and up-to-date.
eucountries: Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
